citations.desc: NOTIFICATION OF CHANGE OF NAME, ADDRESS, CONTROL, OR OWNERSHIP OF BUSINESS.
citations.narrative:
Facility was vacant and in the process of being demolished for construction of a new home. Owner has vacated
property and animals are gone. It is the responsibility of license to notify USDA regional office within 10 days of
changing address.
Correct: As soon as possible
Could not conduct exit interview with facility representative.

narrative:
2.8(h)
NOTIFICATION OF CHANGE OF NAME, ADDRESS, CONTROL, OR OWNERSHIP OF BUSINESS.
Facility was vacant and in the process of being demolished for construction of a new home.  Owner has vacated
property and animals are gone. It is the responsibility of license to notify USDA regional office within 10 days of
changing address.
Correct: As soon as possible
Could not conduct exit interview with facility representative.
